name: Newgrounds - Removed Ad Containers
description: This removes the ad banners from the site you heartless bastard.
additional_info: The new design doesn't affect some pages, so the old code still remains to support the legacy style until the new design supports all pages. Update 2017-07-17: All ad containers are now removed for the legacy style. Update 2017-04-06: Updated style to reflect new site design.
